description: Manage backup schedule of a backup policy.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy trigger create-schedule
commands.summary: Create backup schedule of a policy.
examples: az dataprotection backup-policy trigger create-schedule --interval-type Weekly --interval-count 1 --schedule-days 2021-05-02T05:30:00 2021-05-03T05:30:00
az dataprotection backup-policy trigger create-schedule --interval-type Hourly --interval-count 6 --schedule-days 2021-05-02T05:30:00

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-policy trigger set
commands.summary: Associate backup schedule to a backup policy.
examples: az dataprotection backup-policy trigger set --policy policy.json --schedule R/2021-05-02T05:30:00+00:00/P1D
